thread.title: iOS 9 is already running on more than half of Apple mobile devices
thread.title_full: iOS 9 is already running on more than half of Apple mobile devices

title: iOS 9 is already running on more than half of Apple mobile devices
text: iOS 9 is already running on more than half of Apple mobile devices Monday, 21 September 2015 (14 minutes ago) Apple may have taken a long while to get users upgrading to iOS 8, but it isn't having any such trouble with iOS 9. The iPhone maker has revealed that more than half of all iOS devices are already running the new software less than a week after it... Well that was fast Apple announced on Monday that the newest version of its mobile software has been in high demand. The company said that more than half of... Mashable 38 minutes ago - Internet Apple has announced that iOS 9 is the fastest adopted software update ever for the company, with more than 50 percent of devices already running the update. iOS... The Next Web 1 hour ago - Internet Apparently, people couldn’t wait to get their hands on Apple’s latest version of iOS. In a press release today, the company said iOS 9 has already been... VentureBeat 2 hours ago - Technology iOS 9 is off to a blockbuster start, with more than 50 percent of all iPhone, iPad and iPod touch units already running the latest mobile operating system,... AppleInsider 2 hours ago - Computer Industry In just 48 hours, Apple has managed to push iOS 9 to more than 21% of iOS devices, according to the latest data from Mixpanel.
